thread.title: Excellent Location with Comfy rooms
thread.title_full: Excellent Location with Comfy rooms - Review of The Nadler Soho, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: RPDivers
title: Excellent Location with Comfy rooms
text:
This is a great location to stay in London.
Near tube stations (more than 1), restaurants, theatres, bares, shops, etc.
Very comfortable room and friendly staff.
Breakfast is outside the hotel but they can provided it in your room.
I will definitely be back for more!
Room Tip: Room 221 was very quite See more room tips
